title: "Amplified Existential Threats: Seth Taube Warns Of The Rapid And Selfish Development Of Ai"
excerpt: "According to Taube,“Existential risks like nuclear proliferation, cyber threats, climate change, biothreats, and the possibility of mass unemployment have been amplified exponentially by technology over the past decades. It is not surprising that people are facing substantially increased trauma, anxiety, and suffering as a result.”"
